answers: Move it to somewhere I can see it, if it's important

question: Organizing systems that work best for you are..
answers: Visual systems that are fast and easy to use, like hooks or open baskets on a shelf
Details systems that are hidden such as file cabinets or subdivided compartments
Hidden systems that are easy to use, such as baskets in the closet or drawer dividers
Visual systems that are carefully organized, such as pegboards or clear drawers

answers: I don't like to hide things out of sight; I'm afraid I will forget about them

I hate putting things away that I am just going to take out again later
